person_say: I've been really stressed lately, and it's keeping me up at night. I just don't know how to manage it.
animal_say: I'm sorry to hear that! There's a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in stress relief. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds like a great idea! I would love to learn some stress relief techniques from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will guide you through relaxing techniques to help you unwind. Let's go meet him!
